definition: a hero with no chance of using his might/to have no opportunity to display one's talents
pinyin: ying1 xiong2 wu2 yong4 wu3 zhi1 di4

definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
